column4: My friend said there is some apt server that has all kinds of packages that the main one doesn't ... like sun's java jre/jdk ... how do I add this server and find out about it?
ah... I heard its not "official"... but that there is still one?
How can I get mysql 4.3 from apt?
you have to go out of your way to get "unstable" stuff
dpkg keeps a log, but i'm not sure where it is kept
if you've got the right codecs onboard, you should be able to convert to anything. having faad and / or faac codecs will let you listen to them as is
for some reason i can't get amarok to pick up the m4a's when it scans... they play though if i add them to the playlist manually
what media player do you use?
they are kind of a new format
as i said earlier, they play fine
nice... rhythmbox has a cleaner interface too
